#summary Configuring MapServer for a BDRS instance

= Instructions =

  # Make sure you have installed MapServer - http://code.google.com/p/ala-citizenscience/wiki/MapServerAndMapCacheSetup
  # Package and deploy your BDRS
  # Go to your deployed directory and run WEB-INF/replaceMapConfigTokens.sh
  # Copy bdrs.map to */usr/lib/cgi-bin/* (or wherever your mapserv cgi script is found).
